Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Sofia Eleonora Fabbri on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Sofia Eleonora Fabbri is a 29 year old Investment Director from Spain.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Sofia Eleonora Fabbri and Giordano tied the knot in 2024. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2013, Sofia graduated from Scuola Media Statale Giancarlo Siani Napoli with a secondary school diploma.
After that, she went on to study at Bocconi University until 2019.
Occupation History:
Sofia Eleonora Fabbri is a 29 year old Investment Director from Spain.
Sofia Eleonora Fabbri launched her career as a Family Office Manager at Banco Santander S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2019 to 2020.
Her subsequent role was as a Investment Director at Banco Santander S.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 2020 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 50000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 2140000 EUR from her late grandmother, a renowned Corporate Lawyer, in 2015.
Client Summary: In summary, Sofia has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
